text:
Sergio Graziani (10 November 1930 – 25 May 2018) was an Italian actor and voice actor. He was born in Udine, Italy.
Graziani was known for his movies "The Five Days" and "Goodnight, Ladies and Gentlemen". He also voiced dubbed Peter O'Toole, Donald Sutherland, Michael Caine and Professor Farnsworth (voiced by: Billy West).
Graziani died on 25 May 2018 in Rome, Italy at the age of 87.
